name: SpeakingVolumesAudioWhitePapers
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Speaking Volumes provides an innovative gateway to broader community relevance and member engagement for every local chamber of commerce in America. The Voice revolution has gone mainstream, led by Amazon’s Alexa, and as of December 1, 2019, there were 200,000,000 installed smart speaker devices in American households. This is no fad, nor flash in the pan. This is a robust technological movement, and ChamberCentric is your guide. This channel features regular insights and tips for making the most of this new, rapidly adopted technology through what we call Audio White Papers. We hope you enjoy. Please let us know how we can do better by emailing us at info@chambercentric.com. We love feedback!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
